basics.name: Hrvoje Čačić
basics.label: System Engineer
basics.summary: IT Professional with 7+ years industry experience in diverse technologies and solutions. Specialized in custom system integration and automation. On a constant quest for knowladge be that in large scale ISP solutions or private clouds.

work.summary: As a network deployment and integration engineer I work on integration automation and project monitoring. Our stack is fat and thats how we like it. Completing the project and delivering it on time with performance is the main objective.

Being a system engineer in fast growing firm is challenging place that makes you grow. From supporting colleagues, working on bare bones servers to handeling e2e ISP integrations. Prime work consists of scripting and infrastructure deployment.
Working as IT support for IPTV and ADSL. Working on linux, network and debugging skills.

education.institution: Technical school Ruđer Bošković of Zagreb

courses: Integration and implementation of computer networks
Oracle Database 12c R2: Administration Workshop Ed3 Classroom Training

projects.name: ISP cpe administration solution
projects.description: Working remotely configuring virtual production centos 7 servers environment with clustering front-end and backend consisting of 5 servers. Everything is custom made bottoms up from the networking level. Successfully staged, tested and deployed to production.

projects.name: Building OTT video infrastructure for ISP
projects.description: Building complete production isp environment for ott solution. Consisting of large video transcoding cluster running on ubuntu to seperate set of front-end and backend servers running clustered java servers to postgres and oracle databases. My involvement was from ground up in all sectors of the project. From the barebones servers to configuration/deployment and application integration testing. It was a long term project with many valuable lessons and a second iteration.
keywords: Linux, Android, Java testing, Scripting/DevOps, r&d, Oracle

projects.name: Indosat Ooredoo sms firewall solution
projects.description: Integration of sms firewall for a client in Jakarta. Working on interesting networking stack with large amount of traffic running trough big vm cluster. I collaborated with other team members in means of system architecture and integration, deployment as well as PoC.
keywords: Centos, Ansible, Java 8, Metrics and monitoring stack, Groovy, Python
